charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Marnie and Piers
together in town.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_0300_1:
What’re you doin’ here? Are you also out for a
stroll, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_0402_0700_1: Yes, you could say it’s something like that.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_0800_1: Big Bro seemed bored, so I asked him to join me.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_0900_1:
I was thinking up a tune for my new song, when
Marnie and Moltres surprised me by showing up
out of the blue.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1000_1:
After finding a strong-looking opponent, Moltres
always wants to start a battle.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1100_1:
The same thing happened to me when I first
met Moltres.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1200_1:
I was walking around on the Isle of Armor in
Galar, when Moltres came up and insisted on
a battle.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1400_1:
I was a little surprised, but I’ll never turn down
a battle!
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1500_1:
We acknowledged each other’s strength during the
battle and decided to form a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1600_1:
Not only did you demonstrate your strength to each
other, but you also managed to make a
heart-to-heart connection through battle.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1700_1: And as far as I can tell, Moltres also hates to lose.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_1900_1:
I think you already know, but Marnie really hates
to lose.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_2000_1:
When she first started Pokémon battling, if she
ever lost—
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_2100_1: W-wait, Bro! Don’t talk about my past!
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_0302_2400_1: I want to know about Marnie’s past.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_0402_2500_1:
Y-you don’t need to know about my past! I want
you to see who I am now!
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_2600_1:
Marnie used to cry all the time, but now she’s
grown up.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_2700_1:
She handles a Dark-type Pokémon like Moltres
very well—even though it’s not the easiest to
deal with.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_2800_1:
When Team Yell went out of control in Galar,
we couldn’t have handled the situation if Marnie
weren’t around.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_2900_1:
I want her to replace me and become the
Gym Leader of Spikemuth.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_3000_1:
Actually, I wanna wait on that for now and get
better at battling on Pasio first.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_3200_1:
Moltres has been eager to battle you this
whole time!
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_0402_3600_1:
When eyes meet...that’s when a battle begins!
You don’t have time to prepare!
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_3700_1:
I’d appreciate it, too. Please battle Marnie and
help her grow even stronger.
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_3800_1:
OK then, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’ll show
you how strong we are!
charaepi_ch0245_90_mary/2301_1201_3900_1:
Moltres is excited about it, and Big Bro is watching
me, so there’s no stopping now!
